text.more: I used ngrams and a part-of-speech tagger to find every noun that came directly before or after the word "great" in all 58 Presidential Inaugural Addresses. Then I used the Python module NetworkX to turn these words into a semantic network, the software application Gephi to visualize the network, and the Sigma.JS plugin to produce this interactive web visualization.
text.intro: This is a semantic network of U.S. Presidents and the things they described as "great" in their Inaugural Addresses. Please explore and have a great time.
text.title: Things That the U.S. Presidents Described as Great in their Inaugural Addresses

legend.edgeLabel: edges = when a President describes a thing as "great" in an inaugural address
legend.nodeLabel: nodes = Presidents or words that appear next to great
